title: This $100ish Amazon PC Is Apparently "Perfect for gaming"...
description: *Today's video sponsor* Go sign up to Linode here:   I bought the cheapest computer I could find that mentioned gaming, which went well.  Here is a link to the mini PC I bought on Amazon.ca for CAD$149/US$108:  (Affiliate)  Visit our store for a noob-worthy T-shirt or mouse pad at   If you'd like to help us buy weird computers and tech to make videos on, consider 'Joining' the channel on YouTube here:  Or you can support the channel on Patreon:   *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
